txt.en:
'The insects you discovered at the burrows are of great concern to me. Such sizeable and venomous creatures are a source of fear and terror to my heart.

'Perhaps you might use your talents to rid us of this threat? Perhaps if the insects perceive a threat greater than themselves, they might not fancy a change in their natural fodder.

'Will you do this for me?'
'Wonder of wonders! Many thanks, my friend. I have a terror of things that creep, and I thought I might awaken one morning to find myself within their terrible nests.'
Your discovery of great insects among the burrows has both caused Gisalic concern and inspired brilliance.
Insects can be found at the nest, north-east of the Woodman camp in the Rushgore.\n\nGisalic asked you to defeat many of the insects you discovered in the Rushgore.
Talk to Gisalic at the Woodman camp in the Rushgore
Gisalic is at the Woodman camp in the Rushgore, south-west of the insect-nest.\n\nYou should return to Gisalic with news of your success.
